name: Harle-Tsu
description: Harle-Tsu, bred by the Southern Humboldt Seed Collective, is a high-CBD hybrid cross between Harlequin and Sour Tsunami. With a CBD content 20 times higher than its THC content, Harle-Tsu brings relief to pain and inflammation without psychoactivity. Harle-Tsu seeds have a 75% chance of expressing its high-CBD characteristics, and indoor plants will finish flowering in 8 weeks.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Focused, Sleepy, Stress, Pain, Depression, Inflammation, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy, Anxious
